channel.title: Milestone 6 Requirements (Spring 2022) :: K-State CIS 400 Textbook
channel.description: Web Only This textbook was authored for the CIS 400 - Object-Oriented Design, Implementation, and Testing course at Kansas State University. This section describes assignments specific to the Fall 2022 offering of that course. If you are not enrolled in the course, please disregard this section. General requirements: You will need to follow the style laid out in the C# Coding Conventions You will need to comment your code using XML comments
